body_html:
Try running

sudo pip install autograd

Building TensorFlow now requires autograd. When I ran the command it above on Ubuntu 14.04, it gave an error about requiring a Fortran compiler, which I installed with

sudo apt-get install gfortran

@alextp can you add the autograd dependency under the "Prepare environment for Linux" section in the Installing TensorFlow from Sources guide? autograd is currently only listed on the "Prepare environment for Mac OS" section.
body_text:
Try running
sudo pip install autograd

Building TensorFlow now requires autograd. When I ran the command it above on Ubuntu 14.04, it gave an error about requiring a Fortran compiler, which I installed with
sudo apt-get install gfortran

@alextp can you add the autograd dependency under the "Prepare environment for Linux" section in the Installing TensorFlow from Sources guide? autograd is currently only listed on the "Prepare environment for Mac OS" section.
body:
Try running
```
sudo pip install autograd
```
Building TensorFlow now requires autograd. When I ran the command it above on Ubuntu 14.04, it gave an error about requiring a Fortran compiler, which I installed with
```
sudo apt-get install gfortran
```

@alextp can you add the autograd dependency under the "Prepare environment for Linux" section in the [Installing TensorFlow from Sources](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md) guide? autograd is currently only listed on the "Prepare environment for Mac OS" section.
